DOC.detailed_description: This study aim investigate effect diet enrich deplete food high risk contain pro-inflammatory bacterial molecule , marker inflammation cardiometabolic risk healthy men . The study design interventional diet study , 7 day dietary advice avoid process food , follow 4 day lunch even meal provide volunteer . Anthropometric blood marker cardiovascular disease risk measure start end dietary phase . The aim gain improve understanding process food modify risk cardiometabolic disease . Three blood sample , 15 ml , take day 0 , 8 12 . Measurements timepoint include weight , waistline , serum low-density lipoprotein cholesterol , high density lipoprotein cholesterol , triglyceride , insulin , leptin , C-reactive protein endotoxin . Volunteers request avoid process food , ready-prepared meal , food contain minced meat , food contain ready-chopped vegetable , cheese chocolate first 7 day study . For day 8 11 , volunteer provide meal , purchase local supermarket , previous test found contain high level bacterial pro-inflammatory molecule ( PAMPs ) . Diet diary collect study combine diet recall information investigate habitual on-study frequency consumption specific food group .
